author: MPX
title: Zerlina: Let’s call ‘birtherism’ what it is—racism
description: “Donald Trump says these things simply because of what Barack Obama and Kamala Harris look like, and where their parents came from,” says Zerlina Maxwell. “We need to stop calling this ‘birtherism.’ Let's call it what it is: racism.”

title: Black women activists support Kamala Harris VP pick

description: The coronavirus pandemic is forcing college football administrators to address player treatment, as the debate rages over whether college athletes should play during the pandemic, and whether these unpaid student athletes are being treated more like employees…

title: Julián Castro: 'I’d be lying if I didn’t say I’m disappointed' in lack of Latino speakers at DNC
